title: Grab the Galaxy S21 FE for just $550 today ($150 off)
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S21 FE (“Fan Edition”) was a good phone on paper when it was released earlier this year, but considering it had a year-old chipset and minimal improvements over the older Galaxy S21, the starting price of $699 didn’t really make any sense. Samsung started dropping the price shortly afterwards, and now you

The post Grab the Galaxy S21 FE for just $550 today ($150 off) appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Galaxy S21 FE is finally a good deal, as Samsung dropped the price by $150 at multiple retail stores.
